scripts.dist-windows: npm run build-python-win && sleep 5 && electron-builder --win portable --x64
scripts.setup-python: cd python-experiment-rapidocr && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build-python: cd python-experiment-rapidocr && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install pyinstaller && pyinstaller --onefile --windowed ocr_service.py --distpath ../resources/python-ocr
scripts.build-python-win: cd python-experiment-rapidocr && .venv\Scripts\activate && pip install pyinstaller && pyinstaller --onefile --windowed ocr_service.py --distpath ..\resources\python-ocr
